title: Atlas Beach Club Vibes (Half-day)
overview: Vibrant poolside club with cocktails, DJ sets, and lounging areas in Seminyak.

stops.description: Arrive, enjoy cocktails, and poolside lounging.
Experience live DJ performances by the pool.

title: Atlas Beach Club All Day (Full-day)
overview: A full day of poolside fun, cocktails, and live music at Atlas Beach Club.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the pool, cocktails, and live music.
Relax by the pool, enjoy live DJs, or participate in club activities.
